Posts.Content: Hello, I am 49 and received some news about 3 weeks ago after my biopsy that I had cancer. My Gleason score is a 6. My question is which is the better of the types of surgery, robotic or open prostectomy. I have reviewed Duke Med and Vanderbilt Urology they were recommended by a retired oncologist friend. I live in North Carolina.
Posts.Title: I was diagnosed 3 weeks ago with prostate cancer. Type of surgery.
